lead_paragraph: His near-apocalyptic warnings, accusations and crude innuendo are nearly unheard-of in modern campaigns, unnerving Republicans and enraging Democrats.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Barrage of Heated Speech Has Little Precedent
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Barrage of Heated Rhetoric Has Little Precedent

snippet: His near-apocalyptic warnings, accusations and crude innuendo are nearly unheard-of in modern campaigns, unnerving Republicans and enraging Democrats....
abstract: Donald Trump has made series of low-brow statements and near-apocalyptic warnings on campaign trail that are unprecedented in modern American presidential campaign history; comparison of Trump's statements to closest historical analogs provided.
